item.title: Bypassing censorship: tools and services
item.description: Bypassing the censorship in Russia Link to heading The level of censorship in Russia has been increasing over last few decades and was pushed to the new heights after the war has started. In the following post I would like to discuss the options we have to bypass the restrictions (of course you can just buy VPN subscription and be done with that, but we are the engineers, right?).
